timeline.message:
ILS: ScanRule Consistency

- Scan Rule class names.
- Unit Test class names.
- CHANGELOG already contains a "maintenance changes" note.

Part of: zaproxy/zaproxy#6049

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.author: thc202

replies.bodyText:
Well I didn't think I should rename the whole add-on.
I guess the keys don't have to be named after the add-on though.
I'll update those that are used by the scan rule.
replies.author: kingthorin
